description: Try our easy to follow Flourless Orange Cake with Orange Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Flourless Orange Cake with Orange Syrup
name: Flourless Orange Cake with Orange Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze juice from the peeled orange, and add to pan with 3/4 cup sugar. Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves and syrup thickens. Spoon over cake. Sprinkle with orange strips and serve.
